instruction: Suggest a method to increase customer engagement on social media.
output: One way to increase customer engagement on social media is to post interesting and relevant content on a regular basis. This could include blog posts, videos, infographics, polls and surveys, images, special promotions and discounts, and other interactive content. Additionally, you can use social listening to monitor what customers are saying about your product and respond to their queries quickly. Finally, you can also use social media advertising to target customers more effectively and reach more potential customers.
